fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: Do members of the executive (the head of state, the head of government, and cabinet ministers) respect the constitution?

fxInfo_responses.value: Members of the executive violate the constitution whenever they want to, without legal consequences.
Members of the executive violate most provisions of the constitution without legal consequences, but still must respect certain provisions.

Somewhere in between (1) and (3). Members of the executive would face legal consequences for violating most provisions of the constitution, but can disregard some provisions without any legal consequences.
Members of the executive rarely violate the constitution, and when it happens they face legal charges.
Members of the executive never violate the constitution.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2exrescon, *_osp, *_ord
